about_the_game:
Zagamihara is a top-down story driven slasher. Within this game you will find atmospheric beautiful pixel environments supplemented with a rich story of survival.


Features


  • A rich, character driven story.
  • 5 masterfully crafted, action-packed levels.
  • 10 beautifully crafted hentai and ecchi artworks to find.
  • Two animated hentai scenes.
  • Two endings.


Story


Your character, Saeko Satō is a senior student at Sagamihara high school. On what seemed a day like any other, you are faced with your mortality as the living dead invade your school and massacre your friends and teachers. As you hastily escape the school grounds and enter the streets of Sagamihara, you are met with death and destruction. Desperate to find refuge, you find you way to a local shrine. With the undead in tow, you traverse the shrine carelessly and corner yourself. As the undead creep towards you, in your desperation you make a final prayer to the shrine located in front of you. As you close your eyes and pray, there is sudden silence in the air. You sit there for a moment within the silence, and then suddenly a stern voice beckons you to open your eyes. There before you stands a hakama clad fox eared girl. From this moment, you know the world has truly changed.


Gameplay


Using your trusty katana, in each level of Zagamihara you will traverse and slash through waves of the undead in order to reach your goal location. Zombies bite hard, so one hit and you're done! Learn to masterfully dash and weave through hordes of zombies.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains cartoon depictions of gore and violence against zombies, and sometimes other humans. Additionally, the game contains still images of naked women and sex scenes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft 32/64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 32/64bit 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Zagamihara puts you in the shoes of Saeko Satō, a senior Student at Sagamihara High School. After the outbreak of a deadly virus that turns people into mindless zombies, you find your self indebted to the fox spirit of a local shrine.
